oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Hank Thompson Show - Series 2, Program 02
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Series 2, program 2 of a radio show hosted by Hank Thompson with his Brazos Valley Boys (including steel guitarist Lefty Nason, fiddler Wade Wood, and singer Billy Stewart), to promote Hank's songbook of his Capitol recordings (songbook commercials not included). Circa 1949.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Hank Thompson; Brazos Valley Boys
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Opening statement (Cousin Abner) -- Theme (Humpty Dumpty Heart) -- Opening statement (Hank Thompson) -- California Women (Hank Thompson and his Brazos Valley Boys) -- Texas Shuffle (Wade Wood fiddle, Brazos Valley Boys) -- Hank Thompson talks -- Soft Lips (Hank Thompson and his Brazos Valley Boys) -- Hank Thompson talks -- Honky Tonk Girl (Hank Thompson and his Brazos Valley Boys) -- Hawaiian Honeymoon (Lefty Nason steel guitar, Brazos Valley Boys) -- Hank Thompson talks -- That Beautiful Picture (Hank Thompson and his Brazos Valley Boys) -- Closing statement (Hank Thompson) -- Theme (Humpty Dumpty Heart)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Thompson, Hank; Brazos Valley Boys; Wood, Wade; Nason, Lefty
